definition: handsome/refined/elegant/graceful/superior/show (loanword)/CL:場|场[chang2]/(literary) to grow/to bloom/(of crops) to produce ears

sentences.english: But i heard you are the best.
sentences.chinese: 在某个领域里最优秀，却又不以此自矜。

sentences.english: This sheeting has excellent entrance angularity, which is typical of encapsulated lens glass bead sheeting.
sentences.chinese: 具有更优秀的入射角，这也正是玻璃微珠的优势所在。

sentences.english: They define an "excellent paper" as one that is highly cited by other researchers.
sentences.chinese: 他们把“优秀论文”定义为引用量高的文章。

sentences.english: This is one of the best novellas I've read in a long time.
sentences.chinese: 这是我长期以来读过的最优秀的中篇小说之一。

sentences.english: I know she loves me and wants me to be the best.
sentences.chinese: 我知道她是爱我的，她想让我成为最优秀的人。

sentences.english: Let's be an excellent student with high EQ and IQ.
sentences.chinese: 让我们成为高情商和高智商的优秀学生。

sentences.english: With the fast business expansion, we are inviting excellent candidates for positions.
sentences.chinese: 现因业务发展需要，诚邀优秀人员加盟北京办事处。

sentences.english: The Chinese show was magnificent. Our athletes were brilliant.
sentences.chinese: 中国的闭幕式非常恢宏壮观，我们的运动员们也优秀。

sentences.english: He boasted that he was the best swimmer in the city.
sentences.chinese: 他夸口说他是本市最优秀的游泳者。

sentences.english: His poetic achievement stands at the center of modern literature.
sentences.chinese: 他是最优秀的英文诗人之一，是现代文学的中流砥柱。

sentences.english: I'll try my best to rout out a good goalkeeper for our football team.
sentences.chinese: 我愿尽力为我们的足球队物色一位优秀的守门员。

sentences.english: Excellent alternative to MMS, send files and photos over GPRS.
sentences.chinese: 优秀的替代彩信，通过GPRS发送文件和照片。

sentences.english: It’s astonishing what great teachers can do for their students.
sentences.chinese: 优秀教师对自己学生所做的令人吃惊。

sentences.english: This year's graduates with major in Automation Control or Electrical Engineering are also welcome.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎优秀的自动化控制或机电工程应届毕业生应聘。

sentences.english: Min merchant group is of an excellent Min merchant tradition and a unique culture.
sentences.chinese: 伴海而居的闽商有着优秀的闽商传统和独特的文化。

sentences.english: just because I'm a performer, and I'm good.
sentences.chinese: 就因为我是一个演员，我很优秀。

definition: top-notch (colloquial)/to push oneself to the front
to reveal one's talent (idiom)/to rise above others/to distinguish oneself
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
peak/apex/world best/number one/finest (competitors)/top (figures in a certain field)
